sQuestion: A carpenter gave an estimate of 980 dollars to build a cover over a patio. His hourly rate is 28 dollars and he expects to need 560 dollars in materials. How many hours will the job take?

sentences.sentence: A carpenter gave an estimate of 980 dollars to build a cover over a patio.
His hourly rate is 28 dollars and he expects to need 560 dollars in materials.
How many hours will the job take?
